items.sentence: Tom usually watches the news while he\'s eating dinner.
Tom doesn\'t know what to say to make Mary feel better.
Tom doesn\'t often help his mother hang up the laundry.
Tom doesn\'t remember doing what everybody says he did.
I don\'t think that Tom will be in Australia next week.
Doesn\'t Tom need an oven? Let\'s give him our old one.
Tom dropped out of college and started his own company.
Tom is having an allergic reaction to something he ate.
Tom is suspected of being involved in the bank robbery.
Tom acted as the boss whenever the boss wasn\'t around.
The last thing I want to do is cause you any more pain.
I wish Tom would hurry up and do what he said he\'d do.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary would be jealous.
Tom was born on the same day that his grandfather died.
I don\'t believe Tom really plans to do that this week.
I don\'t believe that Tom could have said such a thing.
I don\'t expect anything out of the ordinary to happen.
I have a few questions. Would it be OK if I asked them?
Please remember to put out the fire before you go home.
Several thousand people became victims of this disease.
Please tell me which bus to take to get to the station.
Put the book back in the same place where you found it.
I can tell you things you won\'t hear from anyone else.

Tom\'s planning something special for Mary\'s birthday.
Tom took off his glasses and put them down on his desk.
Tom took off his tie and started unbuttoning his shirt.

Boston is on my list of places that I\'d like to visit.
Both Tom and Mary aren\'t very good at speaking French.
Tom couldn\'t just sit by and watch Mary being bullied.
Tom couldn\'t sneak out of the dorm without being seen.
Tom couldn\'t speak any French, so we spoke in English.

It\'s too bad Tom doesn\'t understand French very well.
Tom doesn\'t have any idea where Mary wants to do that.

I assume that Tom will eat dinner with us this evening.
It would be crazy to climb that mountain in the winter.

This is the best Christmas present I\'ve ever received.
This kind of hot weather is something I\'m not used to.
I have fond memories of all the time we spent together.
Tom was so angry at Mary he couldn\'t even look at her.
